text: Hai ureueng mukmin ‘oh taseumbahyang Phon-phon beu rijang mukateuh tarhah Tarhah lom jaroe beu troh bak singkee Tasampoh ulee teuma beu basah Tarhah lom gaki beu troh bak gatok Ban peut nyan tacok han jeut takeubah Meunyo meujunub beudoh jak manoe Meu saket teuh nyoe jeut laen ulah Atawa gata teungoh musaphee U kakoh lagi teuma talangkah Atawa teupeh ngon ureueng inong Teuma ie pih tan hana meurimbah Ka leuh tamita teuma hana ie Nyan jeut hana peue tatayammom bagah Dhoi tanoh nyang got tasampoh muka Ngon jaro gata pih bandua blah Hana meunapsu Allah Taʻala Meularat gata na jeut keu susah Tapi meunapsu mangat gleh gata Lom seumpurna nikmat bak Allah Nikmat keu gata mangat tachuko
